fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Obscure a playerâ€™s house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will fail all visits against your target. If your target is able to kill, they will be roleblocked. Lookouts are not affected by your ability.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You could not visit your target because it was too dark."
"Someone occupied your night. You were roleblocked!"
"It was really dark, but you still managed to make out [visitors]!"
